attributes.action: distance himself from American dominance and  instead work towards a more democratic international order
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: America is currently acting as a global policeman, governing by force rather than consensus.  We choose democracy as our national poltical approach, so why not promote it internationally? In order to live up to our democratic ideals, we need to distance ourselves from America's undemocratic approach to the rest of the world.  We need more global democracy in order to be able to deal with pressing issues like climate change.
